metadata.title: Top Key Players Shaping the Future of the Artificial Intelligence (AI) Robots Industry
metadata.description: Delray Beach, FL , Nov. 24, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The artificial intelligence robots market is being shaped by a select group of established industrial and electronics giants that combine decades of robotics experience with rapid advances in AI. Companies such as Nabtesco Corporation, NIDEC CORPORATION, Panasonic Corporation, YASKAWA ELECTRIC CORPORATION, and ABB bring complementary strengths precision actuation, high-efficiency motors, sensing and control systems, industrial automation platf
metadata.keywords: Panasonic Corporation, NIDEC CORPORATION, Nabtesco Corporation, YASKAWA ELECTRIC CORPORATION, industrial automation, systems integration, machine learning, industrial robotics, sensing and control, mobile manipulators, motion planning
